thread.section_title: Frontierinternet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frontierinternet | frontierinternet.com
thread.title: Angie B. Balderas
thread.title_full: Frontierinternet reviewed by Angie B. Balderas

author: Angie B. Balderas
title: Angie B. Balderas
text: I am paying 83 dollars for 50/50 internet that was claimed to be 59.99, what a joke of a company. I've been fighting with this company since march of 2016. Every month I make a call about something wrong with my bill. Well we are done we are going to be looking elsewhere. I urge people do not become a customer with frontier you will regret it.
